a-date-picker/dateRender.description: custom rendering function for date cells by setting a scoped slot

a-date-picker/disabled.description: determine whether the DatePicker is disabled

a-date-picker/disabledDate.description: specify the date that cannot be selected

a-date-picker/getCalendarContainer.description: to set the container of the floating layer, while the default is to create a div element in body

a-date-picker/popupStyle.description: to customize the style of the popup calendar

a-date-picker/dropdownClassName.description: to customize the className of the popup calendar

a-date-picker/size.description: determine the size of the input box, the height of large and small, are 40px and 24px respectively, while default size is 32px

a-date-picker/disabledTime.description: to specify the time that cannot be selected

a-date-picker/format.description: to set the date format, refer to moment.js

a-date-picker/renderExtraFooter.description: render extra footer in panel by setting a scoped slot

a-date-picker/showTime.description: to provide an additional time selection

a-date-picker/showTime.defaultValue.description: to set default time of selected date
